noProductionLineMachinesFound: There are no machines assigned to this production line.
name: Name

machines.title: Machines
machines.unassignMessage: Are you sure you want to unassign this machine from this production line? (machine will not be deleted)

assignMachineToProductionLineModal.title: Assign machines
assignMachineToProductionLineModal.infoMessage: You can only assign machines that are not assigned to any facility or production line. If a machine is assigned to a facility but needs to be assigned to a production line, first unassign it from the facility.

deleteProductionLineModal.title: Delete production line?
deleteProductionLineModal.message: You’re about to delete this production line. By deleting it, all machines will be unassigned and you can find them in the Machines tab. Do you want to continue?
deleteProductionLineModal.facilityAssignedMessage: You’re about to delete a production line assigned to a facility. By deleting it, all the production line machines will be unassigned from the facility. Do you want to continue?
